Hero.header: Explore affordable and accessible carpooling for exciting travel adventures.
Hero.description: Join our carpool community for eco-friendly, cost-effective travel options in North Macedonia.

Benefits.header: What you will get while using TRAVEL

benefit1.title: Cost-saving Opportunities
benefit1.description: Save money on transportation costs by sharing rides, splitting fuel expenses, tolls, and parking fees with fellow travelers, making travel more affordable for everyone.

benefit2.title: Social Connections
benefit2.description: Connect with like-minded individuals and expand your social network through shared rides, fostering meaningful relationships and memorable experiences along the way.

benefit3.title: Flexible Scheduling
benefit3.description: Enjoy the flexibility to plan rides according to your schedule and preferences, offering convenient transportation options that adapt to your lifestyle and commitments.

benefit4.title: Eco-friendly Travel
benefit4.description: Promote environmental sustainability by traveling with eco-friendly vehicles, reducing pollution and carbon footprint while also cutting down travel costs for users.

Safety.description: Read the guidelines below to ensure your safety

safety1.title: Verify Driver Information
safety1.description: Before accepting a ride, verify the driver's information including their name, photo, and license plate number.

safety2.title: Share Trip Details
safety2.description: Share trip details with a trusted contact, including the driver's information and estimated time of arrival.

safety3.title: Meet in Public Locations
safety3.description: Always meet the driver in a public, well-lit area, and avoid getting into the vehicle if you feel uncomfortable.

safety4.title: Buckle Up
safety4.description: Wear your seatbelt during the entire ride, regardless of the distance or duration.

safety5.title: Stay Alert
safety5.description: Stay alert during the ride and trust your instincts. If something feels off, don't hesitate to speak up or request to end the trip.

safety6.title: Rate and Review
safety6.description: After the ride, rate and review the driver based on your experience. This helps maintain accountability within the community.

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
personalInfo.description: Provide or update your personal information for a better profile
personalInfo.name: Name
personalInfo.phoneDesc: Enter a valid phone number and verify for better safety experience.
personalInfo.cityDesc: Please make sure to enter the current city you live in.
personalInfo.addressDesc: Please make sure to enter a valid address.
personalInfo.firstBoxDesc: Providing accurate information ensures your profile is verified and secure. It helps in seamless communication and service delivery.
personalInfo.secondBoxDesc: For safety reasons, your name and surname should match your government ID. This helps in verifying your identity and protects your account.
personalInfo.thirdBoxDesc: Keeping your contact details up-to-date ensures you receive important notifications and can recover your account if needed.

security.title: Security
security.description: Manage your security settings including password
security.passwordDesc: To change your password, please enter your current password and your new password twice.
security.firstBoxDesc: Changing your password regularly adds an extra layer of security to your account and helps protect your information.
security.secondBoxDesc: Ensure your password is unique and not used for any other accounts. Use a combination of letters, numbers, and special characters.
security.thirdBoxDesc: Never share your password with anyone. No legitimate organization will ask you for your password via email or phone.

payment.title: Payment & Tokens
payment.description: View and manage your payment method and buy tokens
payment.buyDesc: Enter your payment details to buy tokens.
payment.firstBox: Why Valid Payment Information is Important
payment.firstBoxDesc: Providing accurate payment information ensures timely transactions and prevents issues with payments and payouts.
payment.secondBoxDesc: Ensure your payment details are up-to-date to protect your account from unauthorized transactions.
payment.thirdBoxDesc: Keeping your payment information current ensures you receive payments and payouts without any delays.

stats.title: Account Stats
stats.description: Analyze your account statistics and performance metrics

deactivate.title: Deactivate Account
deactivate.description: Permanently deactivate your account if you no longer need it

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage features of the website such as theme, language etc.

History.notFoundCreatedText: You have not created and completed a travel. Check back later or create a new travel
History.notFoundJoinedText: You have not joined any travels at the moment/past. Check back later or join now.

Travels.notFoundOngoingText: You have no ongoing travels at the moment. Check back later or create a new travel.
Travels.notFoundPendingText: You have no pending reservation requests at the moment.

CreateTravel.title: Create Travel
CreateTravel.desc: Use the form below to create a new travel
CreateTravel.locationPlaceholder: Enter the location you will start
CreateTravel.destinationPlaceholder: Enter the destination you will reach
